currentIntent.name: intent-name
currentIntent.confirmationStatus: None, Confirmed, or Denied (intent confirmation, if configured)

userId: User ID specified in the POST request to Amazon Lex.
inputTranscript: Text used to process the request
outputDialogMode: Text or Voice, based on ContentType request header in runtime API request

recentIntentSummaryView.confirmationStatus: None, Confirmed, or Denied (intent confirmation, if configured)
recentIntentSummaryView.dialogActionType: ElicitIntent, ElicitSlot, ConfirmIntent, Delegate, or Close
